title: Past Events
subtitle: A showcase of our most memorable events and celebrations

items.title: Villa Benedetta Wedding
items.description: A spectacular three-day wedding celebration in the Italian countryside featuring 300 guests, live orchestra, and custom floral installations.

items.title: Maison Lumière Launch
items.description: An exclusive product launch for luxury fashion brand featuring immersive experiences, celebrity guests, and international media coverage.

items.title: Wellington Charity Gala
items.description: Annual black-tie charity gala raising funds for education initiatives, featuring live auction, gourmet dining, and entertainment.

items.title: Milano Fashion Week Afterparty
items.description: Exclusive afterparty celebrating emerging designers with installations, performances, and networking opportunities for industry professionals.
